short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LexiLeveler: Transform web text readability for learners & professionals with this Chrome plugin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to Lexi Leveler, the innovative Chrome browser plugin designed to revolutionize the way you interact with text on the web. Whether you're a language learner, a professional seeking clearer comprehension, or just curious about varying linguistic complexities, LexiLeveler is your go-to tool for customizing text readability.
